In England, in the seven days to 14 July, there were 239,820 new confirmed cases (426.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 07 July, there were 180,492 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 33% (59,328 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 19 July is 4,769,632 (8,473.8 cases per 100,000 population).
